title: How to Make Eggless Fruit and Nut Loaf

steps.headline: Place the dates and sultanas in a bowl.
Sprinkle the dried fruit with the bicarbonate of soda.
Add the butter or margarine and sugar.
steps.description: Stir until the butter and sugar melt.

steps.headline: Add the plain flour, salt, and chopped walnuts (if including).
Pour the mixture into a cake pan lined with baking paper.
Place in the oven and bake for 1 hour.
steps.description: Remove from the oven when baked and allow to cool for 5 minutes in the pan. Remove and cool completely on a wire cooling rack.

steps.headline: Serve in slices.
steps.description: This goes well with the slices buttered.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Place the dates and sultanas in a bowl.  Sprinkle the dried fruit with the bicarbonate of soda. Pour over the boiling water. Add the butter or margarine and sugar. Stir until the butter and sugar melt. Add the plain flour, salt, and chopped walnuts (if including). Mix until moist. Pour the mixture into a cake pan lined with baking paper.  Place in the oven and bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven when baked and allow to cool for 5 minutes in the pan. Remove and cool completely on a wire cooling rack. Serve in slices. This goes well with the slices buttered.
